grackle:AerialAdvantage.NAME: Aerial Advantage
grackle:AerialAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E] NL Enter grackle:Aloft NL Draw !grackle:magic2! cards.
grackle:AerialAdvantage.FLAVOR: It's over Nob! I have the high ground!

grackle:AirToGroundMissiles.NAME: Air to Ground Missiles
grackle:AirToGroundMissiles.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !grackle:hits! times to ALL enemies.

grackle:BombingRun.NAME: Bombing Run
grackle:BombingRun.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !grackle:hits! times NL to ALL enemies.

grackle:BufferInputs.NAME: Buffer Inputs
grackle:BufferInputs.FLAVOR: Two full steps and one half-step will get me back on step-route. ~tinahacks

grackle:BurnCream.NAME: Burn Cream
grackle:BurnCream.DESCRIPTION: Exhausts *Burn cards in hand at the end of your turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Whenever you draw a Status card, draw !M! card
grackle:BurnCream.FLAVOR: You want some burn cream for that?

grackle:BurningBird.NAME: Burning Bird
grackle:BurningBird.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength. NL Gain !B! grackle:Burning.

grackle:ChlorineTrifluoride.NAME: Chlorine Trifluoride
grackle:ChlorineTrifluoride.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! grackle:Burning to ALL enemies.

grackle:CopyCrow.NAME: Copy Crow
grackle:CopyCrow.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card. Add a copy of the card to your hand.
grackle:CopyCrow.FLAVOR: Grackles aren't corvids, but you'd think they are. ~corndan

grackle:Death.NAME: Death
grackle:Death.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has !M! or less HP, set their NL HP to 0.

grackle:Duck.NAME: Duck!
grackle:Duck.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Quack.

grackle:EmbodyFire.NAME: Embody Fire
grackle:EmbodyFire.DESCRIPTION: Damage from grackle:Burning and NL Burn cards heals instead.

grackle:FightFire.NAME: Fight Fire
grackle:FightFire.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust each *Burn in your discard pile. NL Deals %s + !M! damage for each card exhausted NL (Deals !D! damage.)

grackle:FireWithin.NAME: Fire Within
grackle:FireWithin.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Fireheart.

grackle:Flock.NAME: Flock
grackle:Flock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !grackle:hits! times. NL Increase the hits of ALL Flock cards by !M! this combat.

grackle:Grenenade.NAME: Grenenade
grackle:Grenenade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !grackle:hits! times. NL May be upgraded multiple times.

grackle:Parachute.NAME: Parachute
grackle:Parachute.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exit your Stance.

grackle:Paratrooper.NAME: Paratrooper
grackle:Paratrooper.DESCRIPTION: Exit stance. NL Deal !D! damage !grackle:hits! times.

grackle:Perch.NAME: Perch
grackle:Perch.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 [E]. NL Gain !M! Vigor. NL Enter Eagle stance.

grackle:PhoenixFeather.NAME: Phoenix Feather
grackle:PhoenixFeather.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, heal !M! HP.

grackle:Plague.NAME: Plague
grackle:Plague.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! grackle:Peck.
grackle:Plague.FLAVOR: A group of grackles is called a "plague" for obvious reasons.

grackle:ResearchAndDev.NAME: Research and Development
grackle:ResearchAndDev.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade a random card at the end of combat. NL Lost if you lose health.
grackle:ResearchAndDev.FLAVOR: I just need some time to think...

grackle:SelfBurn.NAME: Self Burn
grackle:SelfBurn.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add an *Ethereal *Burn to your discard pile.
grackle:SelfBurn.FLAVOR: Do you want some burn cream for that?

grackle:SnapGracklePop.NAME: Snap, Grackle, Pop
grackle:SnapGracklePop.FLAVOR: Did you know grackles like rice krispies? ~corndan

grackle:SummonEgrets.NAME: Summon Egrets
grackle:SummonEgrets.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times.
grackle:SummonEgrets.FLAVOR: [grackle:MusicNoteIcon] And Some Egrets in a pear tree [grackle:MusicNoteIcon]

grackle:Suplex.NAME: Suplex
grackle:Suplex.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, !M! per hit. NL Take !M! damage. NL Does not consume extra hits.

grackle:Swoop.NAME: Swoop
grackle:Swoop.DESCRIPTION: Exit grackle:Aloft. NL At the end of your turn, enter grackle:Aloft .

grackle:Tailwind.NAME: Tailwind
grackle:Tailwind.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.

grackle:ThisWillHurt.NAME: This Will Hurt
grackle:ThisWillHurt.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to EVERYONE. NL Gain !B! Block.
grackle:ThisWillHurt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! Block.

grackle:TryThatAgain.NAME: Let's Try That Again
grackle:TryThatAgain.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand, NL then draw that many cards.
grackle:TryThatAgain.FLAVOR: A Game Over is only temporary.

grackle:WildFire.NAME: Wild Fire
grackle:WildFire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! grackle:Burning to ALL enemies. NL Add !grackle:magic2! *Burns to your discard pile.

grackle:WindowPain.NAME: Window Pain
grackle:WindowPain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! temporary Thorns.
